DocAttribute.Name: Segments
DocAttribute.Documentation: The component bounded curves, their transitions and senses. The transition attribute for the last segment defines the transition between the end of the last segment and the start of the first; this transition attribute may take the value discontinuous, which indicates an open curve.

DocAttribute.Name: SelfIntersect
DocAttribute.Documentation: Indication of whether the curve intersects itself or not; this is for information only.

DocAttribute.Name: ClosedCurve
DocAttribute.Documentation: Indication whether the curve is closed or not; this is derived from the transition code of the last segment.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR41
DocWhereRule.Documentation: No transition code should be Discontinuous, except for the last code of an open curve.
DocWhereRule.Expression: ((NOT ClosedCurve) AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(Temp <* Segments | Temp.Transition = Discontinuous)) = 1)) OR ((ClosedCurve) AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(Temp <* Segments | Temp.Transition = Discontinuous)) = 0))

DocWhereRule.Name: WR42
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Ensures, that all segments used in the curve have the same dimensionality.
DocWhereRule.Expression: SIZEOF( QUERY( Temp <* Segments | Temp.Dim <> Segments[1].Dim)) = 0
